question: Have you Started the Recording? you have 10 seconds to start the recording
Can you describe a recent situation that made you feel extremely worried or stressed? What were your thoughts and feelings at that moment?

How does social pressure affect your relationships with friends and family?
Have you ever felt overwhelmed by the pressure to excel at work or in your studies?
What physical symptoms do you experience when you face performance-related stress?
Have you ever been overly concerned about your health or experienced distress related to health issues?
Did you fall prey to Coronavirus? Can you describe any specific situations or challenges you've faced during this time?
Are there specific aspects of your future or career that cause you significant worry or stress?
